title: Dcs
body:
So i've been disconnecting on league around the 20 minute mark, wifi is fine but league doesn't reconnect. Its gotten to the point where the leaver busters message is appearing. anything i can do?

In game rn and all my abilities are going off minutes late, game is going as if i was spectating it. champs are jittery, minions aren't moving at all.

replies.body: It sounds like you're experiencing packet loss caused by a weak connection.  Your wi-fi connection could be a culprit here, but we can do some research to find out what's going wrong.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) which will help assess the situation, and also provide instructions specific to your issue.  Let me know what you come up with, and how we can help further!
So ran the log reader and i had almost 39% packet loss. Just used the hextech repair tool too so ill check how things go

This is likely due to network instability. 

1. Restart your modem / router.
2. Restart your computer.

If you continue to experience latency issues afterwards;

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj
